pecifically in the context of the build/test system for

I can't find anything in the build.xml or any included configs that
> calcu=
lates tests.jvms when it is set to auto, so I must conclude that it is

lculated either by junit or ant.  The former seems more likely, so here I
>=
 am.

> When the number of CPU cores in the system is 4, tests.jvms is s=
et to 3.
> This seems like a reasonable choice to me, so no complaints ther=
e.  What
> I'd like to change is what happens when there are three CPU core=
s in the

in that
> instance, but the automatic calculation sets it to 1.

>

 project gets the bug/wish issue - Lucene, Ant, or Junit?  Is my idea

sonable?
